name: Untitled Rhythm Game (Thulko)
description:
Submission for MiniJam125: Signal

Limitation: Everything is tied to the rhythm

How to Play

Climb to the top , avoiding the obstacles that toggle based on the rhythm of the music.  PS some of the later checkpoints don't work.

Controls
  • Keyboard
    • Arrow Keys  - Left/Right
    • Z - Jump
    • R - respawn at last Checkpoint
Credits
  • Programmer: Thulko
  • Art: Kenney - 1-bit-platformer-pack
  • Music: TAD - Cue
